Promo.title: Redeem promo code
Promo.mustBeSignedIn: You must be signed in to redeem a promo code.
Promo.label: Promo code
Promo.success: The code was redeemed successfully. Gold trial is active.
Promo.footnote: Activating a code grants you a free Gold trial for a limited time, according to the program rules.

Checkout.termsCheckbox: I confirm I've read the terms and accept the obligations during the purchase and later use of the package.
Checkout.termsNote: Only required on the first purchase or when the terms change ({version}).
Checkout.termsMissing: Please confirm you accept the terms before purchasing.
Checkout.termsSaveError: Saving your acceptance failed. Please try again.

errors.accessDenied: Access denied ‚Äî sign in as admin or ask to be whitelisted.
errors.llmInvalidJson: The AI service returned invalid JSON.
errors.missingArtifact: Artifacts are missing ‚Äî run the full build (pnpm run createx:build).

alerts.llmDisabled: AI checks are temporarily disabled. Submissions await manual review.
alerts.bundleNotReady: The bundle is not ready yet.
alerts.artifactsPending: Artifacts are not ready yet. Wait for the build to finish or rerun the build, then try again.
alerts.noBuildApprove: There is no active build to approve.
alerts.noBuildReject: There is no active build to reject.

llmDetails.enableHint: Enable AI checks in the configuration to generate this report.

emailTemplates.heading: Email templates
emailTemplates.description: Edit the content of emails sent by the system. Use {{placeholders}} for dynamic values (e.g. {{displayName}}, {{appTitle}}).
emailTemplates.createDescription: Enter a unique ID (e.g. welcome, review:approval_notification).
emailTemplates.scenarioDropdownHint: Select a scenario from the dropdown.
emailTemplates.scenarioLoadFailed: Unable to load the template or fallback text for this scenario.
emailTemplates.restoreInfo: Fallback restored locally ‚Äî remember to Save to persist.

Home.tagline: Curated marketplace for browser-based experiences. Build, share and explore.
Home.tryAdjust: Try adjusting your search or filters.
Home.beFirst: Be the first to publish an app!

Toasts.likeError: Unable to like the app. Please check the API URL and server status.

Footer.slogan: The marketplace for browser-based apps and games.

Pro.subtitle: Upgrade your app with our advanced packages
Pro.loadError: Failed to load packages. Please try again.
Pro.goldDescription: Unlock higher limits, premium storage and priority publish support.
Pro.goldFeatureStorage: Larger upload & storage quota for bundles and assets
Pro.goldFeatureAds: Removes THESARA.SPACE ads for you and your published apps
Pro.goldFeatureSupport: Priority publish review and dedicated support channel
Pro.noAdsDescription: Remove THESARA.SPACE ad slots from dashboards and every published experience.
Pro.noAdsFeatureRemoval: Zero ads in the editor, dashboard and your apps
Pro.noAdsFeatureFocus: Keeps players focused on your content (no banners or interstitials)

Login.welcomeBody: Discover, play and publish mini‚Äëapps. Sign in to like apps, publish your own, and sync progress.
Login.title: Sign in
Login.subtitle: Use Google or your email account.

Create.name: Name
Create.bundleHintPart1: The ZIP bundle must include the build output together with
Create.bundleHintPart3: The worker installs it locally and runs
Create.bundleAiWarning: IMPORTANT: Apps that rely on Google AI Studio, Gemini, Kimi or any other LLM provider must include their own API key. Without it the bundle will not work after publishing.
Create.bundleAiWarningDetail: Enter your key below (we do not supply one). Leave it empty only if your AI app works without a private key. Documentation on AI bundles is coming soon.
Create.bundleAiNoKeyNote: You can still publish demos that do not require keys ‚Äî it depends on how you built the app.
Create.bundleAiApiPlaceholder: Paste your provider key (stored only for this build)
Create.bundleAiApiHelp: We inject this key into the bundle so it can reach your AI service. If the app stops working later, rotate or update the key.
Create.previewGraphicHint: Pick one of our presets or upload your own image (max 1MB).
Create.previewTitleHint: Displayed on a semi-transparent banner over the selected graphic.
Create.previewFileReadFailed: Failed to read the selected image.
Create.previewUploadFailed: Failed to save graphic. Please try again.
Create.mustSignIn: Please sign in first to publish.

App.previewGraphicHint: Choose one of our presets or upload your own image (max 1MB).
App.previewTitleHint: Shown on a semi-transparent banner over the selected graphic.
App.previewUploadFailed: Failed to save graphic. Please try again.
App.previewFileReadFailed: Failed to read the selected image.

Rooms.descriptionDemoCompact: Demo room is public and used for quick testing. Everyone shares the same data.
Rooms.descriptionPrivateCompact: This room has private storage shared only between members with the same PIN.
Rooms.descriptionDemoFull: This demo room is public and designed to showcase the app. Create your own room and PIN for private storage.
Rooms.descriptionPrivateFull: The room you selected has private storage shared with everyone who knows the name and PIN.
Rooms.modeHint: For permanent and private storage, create your own room and PIN.

errors.missingCredentials: Enter a room name and PIN.
errors.generic: Working with rooms is temporarily unavailable.
